body: Well not as much butt still! Yeah so the reason why I've been lagging so much is that my download speed has decreased to 3.8mbps. Which was horrible slow because I'll get like a 1 second ping on avicus and I would be constantly getting kicked from bf3 servers. I called comcast and I'm like YO FIX MY INTERNET and they be all like kk nelson. So now it's 5.77 mbps WOO YEAH
